forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High near 20C. NNE winds shifting to W at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 67F. NE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A clear sky. Low near 10C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A clear sky. Low near 50F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 19C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High around 65F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 50F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High around 20C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 67F. NNE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 17C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 63F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Becoming windy late. Low 12C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 53F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers along with windy conditions. High near 15C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 58F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers, with winds diminishing late. Low around 10C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 49F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 56F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly clear conditions later at night. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low around 45F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 57F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 57F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.
